full_summary:
**Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services at the High Commission of Canada in Canberra, Australia**

**Note: This announcement has expired.**

**Solicitation Number:** 23-240552
**Reference Number:** cb-377-93174976
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 8, 2024, 2:00 PM (AEST)

**Description:**
The High Commission of Canada in Canberra, Australia, invites proposals for landscaping services at two locations:

1. **Chancery**: The Chancery office building, located on Commonwealth Avenue, covering approximately 10,700 square meters.
2. **Official Residence**: The official residence, located at 32 Mugga Way, Red Hill, covering around 3,500 square meters.

The required services include:

* Landscaping maintenance for the grounds, gardens, and flowerbeds
* Maintenance of driveways, paths, parking spaces, and other paved areas

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers from various countries, including those listed in the Trade Agreements section.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** World
* **Regions of Delivery:** Australia

**Note:**
This announcement has expired, and no further response will be accepted.

Please find the complete tender package and description attached at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31518/23-240552-landscaping-and-grounds-maintenance-services-at-the-high-commission-of-canada-in-australia_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31518/23-240552-landscaping-and-grounds-maintenance-services-at-the-high-commission-of-canada-in-australia_0.pdf).

To submit your proposal, please refer to the attached document for instructions.

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:
Nancy Levasseur
International Proposals
Phone: 343203-0000
Email: [internationalproposals@international.gc.ca](mailto:internationalproposals@international.gc.ca)
